title: Master's Project
description: Under the guidance of a faculty member, students explore a design project that relates to advance theoritical  research through a human prespective with a design and/or technology  focus on a product.  The project may include areas  in instructional design, human-computer interaction, learning, neuroscience, perception, product design, user-centered design, and usability.

prerequisites: ID 6101 Graduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
